resources.string: Data science is science about data
Right, data science is about data processing methods
Exam mode is temporary not available

QdsQuiz - application for learning fundamentals of machine learning from Open Data Science Community.
 In the "Lecture" section posted helpful links to mlcourse.ai lectures.
 In the "Flash Cards" section you will find cards with course materials.
 Cards persisted into JSON-format. You can create own set of Flash Cards and load into application.
 NOTE! Flash Card content encoded in json format, but file extension must be *.txt.
 In the "Training" section you can answer to questions, your result will posted in the main screen.
 "Examine" mode is temporary not available while hosting problems are not solved.
 Sources are on https://github.com/balezz/OdsQuiz, feel free to post issues and pull requests.
